name: Kobold Maid
description:
This is my first "game" and an incomplete entry for the 7DRL game jam.

Everybody loves Kobolds! The idea was that you would clean a dirty mansion and instead of monsters, you would encounter dirt, grime, cobwebs etc that increased daily. Being a clumsy idiot, you would have to watch out because failing an attack roll would mean destroying things like vases, etc.

After about 6 days of development, code was becoming too difficult to manage, and to do something as simple as creating a monster, it had to be added in 3 different places. Unfortunately, the gameplay is very minimal.

Controls

  • WASD / Arrows / Numpad: Move
  • Q: Spawn 20-50 critters
  • E: Spawn 1 critter
  • R: Reroll stats
  • C: Close door (or window)

Bump into critters to "shoo" (attack) them away from the manor! There is no win condition but you might set a personal goal to remove all the critters (except one :>)

Disclosure

All the code is released under the GPL v 3.0. The "Squish" engine was made ahead of time, as were some of the art assets.
